title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 166-3.7 - Retention and disposal of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 166-3.7 - Retention and disposal of records

State Regulations
(a) All records
shall be retained until disposed of in accordance with this section. (b) All records shall be disposed of only in
accordance with Part 295 of this Title. (c) No record shall be destroyed to avoid the
provisions of this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
166-3.7

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
